replies.bodyText:
It is an identifier that is returned by the server-platform-origin REST API in the platform-services API.
Typically it looks a lot like this...
ODPi Egeria OMAG Server Platform (version 2.4-SNAPSHOT)
replies.author: grahamwallis

replies.bodyText: Yup - good spot - thanks. I had even search for all occurrences of 'dino' but had match case enabled - d'oh!
replies.author: grahamwallis

replies.bodyText: Found another (mixed case) example the same way - thanks again!
replies.author: grahamwallis
